mapper.select: select e.innerID, ddfin.corporateName as financecode, ddo.occupationName as occupation, e.company, ddi.industryName as industry, e.occAddress, e.occZIP, e.startYear, ddd.dutyName as duty, ddc.casteName as caste, e.annualIncome, e.pin, e.gettime, to_char(e.opendate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') opendate from employment e LEFT JOIN dd_financeorg ddfin on e.financecode = ddfin.financecode LEFT JOIN dd_occupation ddo on e.occupation = ddo.occupationCode LEFT JOIN dd_industry ddi on e.industry = ddi.industryCode LEFT JOIN dd_duty ddd on e.duty = ddd.dutyCode LEFT JOIN dd_caste ddc on e.caste = ddc.casteCode where innerID = #{innerID}
